reviews.text: Our dinner experience was one of the worst dining experience. Service was abysmal with waiting staff more interested in talking amongst themselves than servicing their clients. Our food order was cooked wrongly in one of the main courses taking more than an hour to arrive when all other guests finished their food. The wrong main course arrived hardly edible due to the extreme saltiness. The waitress offered to waive the particular main course, however, this was not done when we settled the bill.  It's not a restaurant we will patronize again nor can we recommend this restaurant.

Great food.The best things in just one restaurant and big screen with all sport wars  with the most comfortable seats. Big bar fastest servers and well severed food. You can enjoy the best food with the sports wars or with live band on Fridays and Saturdays nights
Excellent food. Big portion but reasonable price. Pork steak I gave full mark. Juicy and tender.

Awesome ambience with great quality food must try.
Service is great staff is really so friendly we feel like home at there.

Spent a weekday evening here. Good service from the friendly staff. Thoroughly enjoyed the lasagna which was delicious and piping hot. The pasta layers were thin so wasn't chewy. I'd be happy to go back again!

好想住進此屋苑。讚。

result.name: A Tavola Bar & Grill

reviews.text:
同老公慶祝週年紀念，吾知從幾何時係要食西餐慶祝🍴咁就簡左係樓下既酒吧🍻

因為早早入座，人吾太多，可以要求坐係live band 台前面。服務員好親切咁帶我地入座接著提供兩杯冰水比我地。

一入到去就好似好左外國咁，周圍都係外國人，連服務員💁都係，係時候煉下英文Speaking😂

望望menu，價錢吾太貴🍽，都係平民價，而且望到格離台D野食既份量好多好大。睇飲咩都好花多眼亂，因為其實佢呢到主力做酒吧，酒種應有盡有，而且凌晨會有人係舞池跳舞。重點會播好Chill既英文老歌，當日就播How Deep is your 💗 

我地叫左Seafood pizza 🦐🦑🍕 ,10/12吋，可以簡厚/ 薄批， 我地當然簡12吋既薄批，一黎到香噴噴既焗面包🥯味，芝士做到拉絲效果已經係基本，話明海鮮🦞當然要有蝦，都係已經sautéed 🦐🦑😍，配埋san marzano 🍅 sauce 一流。加埋佢係即叫即製熱辣辣，好好味👍🏽

另外，又叫左個BBQ chicken 🍗 burger 🍔, 首先相機📷食先既我既已影左一輪，佢配埋既薯條🍟竟然無變焾身，而且仲咁脆，脆扑扑好味過M記。而卷心菜沙律🥗的確做到好Fresh 既效果， 清一清口氣。主菜係個個雞胸肉配BBQ sauce , 入面有芝士，蕃茄、BB菠菜，同埋紅洋蔥，全部材料都互相輝映，食落卡卡聲🎈

食左兩碟野一人平均HKD150 到， 但份量大，味道好， 會再黎光顧，因為食氣氛同環境都抵💗

Our dinner experience was one of the worst dining experience. Service was abysmal with waiting staff more interested in talking amongst themselves than servicing their clients. Our food order was cooked wrongly in one of the main courses taking more than an hour to arrive when all other guests finished their food. The wrong main course arrived hardly edible due to the extreme saltiness. The waitress offered to waive the particular main course, however, this was not done when we settled the bill.  It's not a restaurant we will patronize again nor can we recommend this restaurant.

Great food.The best things in just one restaurant and big screen with all sport wars  with the most comfortable seats. Big bar fastest servers and well severed food. You can enjoy the best food with the sports wars or with live band on Fridays and Saturdays nights
Excellent food. Big portion but reasonable price. Pork steak I gave full mark. Juicy and tender.

Awesome ambience with great quality food must try.
Service is great staff is really so friendly we feel like home at there.

result.vicinity: Shops E & F, G/F Seaview Crescent Plaza, Lantau Island Tung Chung, Lantau Island
